summary: This module implements the AWS Batch integration for Metaflow, providing a class that encapsulates the creation, submission, monitoring, log handling, and termination of batch jobs. It leverages Metaflow configuration, AWS services (Batch, S3, Secrets Manager), and internal utilities to manage job lifecycle, capture output, and clean up resources.
business_intent: Allow Metaflow users to execute workflow steps on AWS Batch without dealing with low‑level AWS APIs, ensuring reliable job orchestration, log collection, and secret handling while adhering to user‑defined configurations and tagging policies.
